Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.question: Which of the following is a characteristic feature of central facial paralysis?
question.option_a: Complete paralysis of the entire face, including the forehead
question.option_b: Weakness on the lower half of the face with sparing of the forehead
question.option_c: Paralysis that affects only the upper half of the face
question.option_d: Symmetrical weakness on both sides of the face
